snippet: The Knicks signed John Shurna, a sweet-shooting forward from Northwestern, to a one-year contract, said his agent, Mark Bartelstein.
abstract: New York Knicks sign Northwestern University forward John Shurna to a one-year contract.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks signed John Shurna, a sweet-shooting forward from Northwestern, to a one-year contract, said his agent, Mark Bartelstein.

headline.seo: Knicks Sign Forward John Shurna to One-Year Contract
